name: UKCoreBMI
title: UK Core BMI
description: A set of codes that define a patients level of consciousness. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - DescendantOrSelfOf 60621009 | Body mass index (observable entity) - DescendantOrSelfOf 446974000 |Body mass index centile (observable entity - MINUS   - 846931000000101 | Baseline body mass index   - 852451000000103 | Maximum body mass index   - 852461000000100 | Minimum body mass index  - 715456008 | Percentage median body mass index for age and sex  - 846911000000109 | Baseline body mass index centile (observable entity)|
